crypto.name: 2 power 4
crypto.desc:
Just answer me this simple question: What is 2 x 2 x 2 x 2 = ?

After you get your answer, go ahead and decrypt the cipher I gave you.

crypto.name: RAS
crypto.desc: The famous cryptographic algorithm devised by Rivest, Adleman and Shamir can become so complicated to crack if manipulated/altered properly. Think you know it so well? Go ahead and try to solve this challenge!

crypto.name: Xtreamly Orbital
crypto.desc: We communicate using two files at YCF for security reasons.

forensic.name: Arecibo message
forensic.desc:
A message just arrived from outer space.

Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zzN8NLq76aiENSqfbh7Y312M9gi2G0ga/view

forensic.name: Echos Parody
forensic.desc:
"In the land of echoes, where whispers roam, A tale of clues, finds its home. Laughter and tears, merge in the air, In echoes' parody, stories flare. Footsteps of past, meet those of now, In the echo's chamber, they take a bow. Love's sweet whispers, pain's bitter cry, All in the echoes, they do lie. Listen close, and you will find, Clues and whispers, intertwined. In the echo's game, secrets unfurl, A world of mysteries, for all to swirl."

Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GPdculNuobTkrOPRX898Z69_WkPDWEUi/view

misc.name: Dits and Dahs
misc.desc: My friend sent me an audio file which just does not make any sense to me...Perhaps you can help me understand it?

misc.name: Escape
misc.desc: Prove your mettle and worth as you attempt to escape from the very lair where the bloodthirsty beast lurks!

pwn.name: DEADFOOD
pwn.desc: I know I know... Just like the title, the challenge doesn't really make much sense. It is what it is though. You still gotta solve it...Good Luck!

pwn.name: The Guard
pwn.desc: Welcome to ""The Guard"", where a vigilant sentinel stands between you and victory. Your challenge: outsmart the digital guardian using binary exploitation. But be cautious of its watchful eye and cunning defenses. Will you bypass the guard and claim triumph, or will you falter in your attempt? It's time to prove your mettle.

rev.name: MockingBird
rev.desc: work hard you will get success belive me

steg.name: Blind
steg.desc: i am in front of your nose XD

steg.name: Deep... Deep... Deeper
steg.desc: Let's see how deep you can go.

steg.name: Insignificant
steg.desc: Can you tell me how significant this bit of music really is??

steg.name: The C.S Dictionary
steg.desc: Are you aware of these terms related to the vast field of Computer Science Engineering??

steg.name: You Cant See Me
steg.desc: Wait is John Cena really invisible? Can we actually not see him?? Why does he keep saying that?!

steg.name: Zero Hidden Knight in Space
steg.desc: My girlfriend cheated on me. And My Friend send me "The seamless flow of words hinted at their close connection, like hidden bonds between the letters." And After the first one my Friend Wants more complex That is the reason he hide another thing so I want to solve that steg. Please help me.
